reviewText:
The first 4or 5 seasons (in my opinion) are the best. After that they get pretty stale -- as if the writers got bored. So this 5 season package is just what I needed - and the price is right!

To have to watch these shows on pathetic cable networks like "ME TV" is just awful! I just got tired of watching 15 minutes of commercials for each 30 minute show.  Not only that, but they cut out so many little parts of the show just to make room for more commercials - Absolutely ridiculous! I just couldn't take any more abuse!

So, I bought these. It's so wonderful to watch an old classic like this on HDTV, getting a full clear picture and not have any commercials to be forced to look at. Also, you'd be surprised how much you lose in the way of deleted scenes and programming to make room for those additional commercials. It's absolutely wonderful!

So far the quality has been superb. But we're only on the first DVD. It doesn't look like these all are produced by the same company, (the packaging is different) so I suspect there may be some quality differences. If I notice any, hopefully I'll remember to update this.
Great to re- live the Happy Days shows. I wish they were available digitally.
Fast shipping and my kids are loving the oldies
Very happy with my Happy Days 5 season pack dvds. Wish they sold the entire seasons,  but fast shipment. Great customer service. DVDs look great. Definately would recommend to others.
Surprise for my grandchildren, so they know what their Mom & Dad enjoyed watching when they were young!
